name: PostHog
description: Connect your PostHog instance as the primary data source for behavioral signal detection.

name: Attio
description: Route signals to Attio CRM. Automatically create and update records when buying signals are detected.

name: HubSpot
description: Route signals to HubSpot CRM. Update contacts, create deals, and trigger workflows automatically.

name: Zoho CRM
description: Route signals to Zoho CRM. Sync behavioral signals with your Zoho sales pipeline.

name: Pipedrive
description: Route signals to Pipedrive. Create activities and update deals when revenue signals are detected.

name: Webhooks
description: Send signals to any tool via webhooks. Build custom integrations with your existing stack.

name: n8n
description: Connect to n8n for unlimited automation. Route signals through complex multi-step workflows.
